00014 #include "pulserdriver.h"
00015 #include "chardevicedriver.h"
00016 #include <vector>
00017 
00018 //! My pulser driver
00019 class XH8Pulser : public XCharDeviceDriver<XPulser>
00020 {
00021     XNODE_OBJECT
00022 protected:
00023     XH8Pulser(const char *name, bool runtime,
00024               const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00025               const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00026               const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00027               const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00028 public:
00029     virtual ~XH8Pulser() {}
00030 
00031 protected:
00032     //! Be called just after opening interface. Call start() inside this routine appropriately.
00033     virtual void open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &);
00034     //! send patterns to pulser or turn-off
00035     virtual void changeOutput(bool output, unsigned int blankpattern);
00036     //! convert RelPatList to native patterns
00037     virtual void createNativePatterns();
00038     //! time resolution [ms]
00039     virtual double resolution() const;
00040     virtual double resolutionQAM() const {return 0.0;}
00041     //! minimum period of pulses [ms]
00042     virtual double minPulseWidth() const;
00043     //! existense of AO ports.
00044     virtual bool haveQAMPorts() const {return false;}
00045 private:
00046     //! Add 1 pulse pattern
00047     //! \param term a period to next pattern
00048     //! \param pattern a pattern for digital, to appear
00049     int pulseAdd(uint64_t term, uint16_t pattern);
00050 
00051     struct h8ushort {unsigned char msb; unsigned char lsb;};
00052     std::vector<h8ushort> m_zippedPatterns;
00053 };
